questions.question:
What is the output of the following program?

int add(int a, int b) {
    return a + b;
}

double add(double a, double b) {
    return a + b;
}

int main() {
    int result = add(2.5, 3.5);
    cout << result;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

void print(int a) {
    cout << "int: " << a << endl;
}

void print(double b) {
    cout << "double: " << b << endl;
}

int main() {
    char c = 'A';
    print(c);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

template 
void display(T value) {
    cout << "Template: " << value << endl;
}

void display(int value) {
    cout << "Non-template: " << value << endl;
}

int main() {
    float f = 3.14;
    display(f);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int x = 10;
    {
        int x = 20;
        cout << x << " ";
    }
    cout << x;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int arr[] = {1, 2, 3, 4, 5};
    int *ptr = arr;
    cout << *ptr++ << " " << *ptr;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

void print(int a);
int main() {
    char c = 'A';
    print(c);
    return 0;
}

void print(double b) {
    cout << "double: " << b << endl;
}

What is the output of the following code?

class Demo {
public:
    static int count;
    Demo() { count++; }
};
int Demo::count = 0;
int main() {
    Demo var1;
    Demo var2[5];
    cout << var1.count;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int var = 2;
    do {
        cout << var;
    } while (var++);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

void display(int x) {
    cout << "int: " << x << endl;
}

void display(double y) {
    cout << "double: " << y << endl;
}

int main() {
    char c = 'A';
    display(c);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

void show(int x) {
    cout << "int: " << x << endl;
}

void show(double y) {
    cout << "double: " << y << endl;
}

int main() {
    int n = 3;
    show(n);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

template 
void process(T value) {
    cout << "Template: " << value << endl;
}

void process(double value) {
    cout << "Double: " << value << endl;
}

int main() {
    process(5);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int a = 10;
    if (int a = 20) {
        cout << a << " ";
    }
    cout << a;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

struct Demo {
    int var;
}

int main() {
    Demo str;
    Demo *ptr;
    ptr = &str;
    ptr->var = 100;
    cout << ptr->var;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int i = 0;
    while (i < 5) {
        cout << i;
        if (i == 2) {
            i = 2.5;
        }
        i++;
    }
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

void show(int x);
int main() {
    show(5.5);
    return 0;
}

void show(double y) {
    cout << "double: " << y << endl;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int var = 5;
    cout << var-- << " " << var;
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int var = 0;
    do {
        cout << var;
    } while (var++);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int calculate(int x, int y) {
    return x + y;
}

double calculate(double x, double y) {
    return x * y;
}

int main() {
    cout << calculate(2.5, 3);
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

int main() {
    int i = 0;
    while (i < 5) {
        cout << i;
        if (i == 2) {
            i = 2.5;
        }
        i++;
    }
    return 0;
}

What is the output of the following code?

template 
void display(T value) {
    cout << "Template: " << value << endl;
}

void display(int value) {
    cout << "Non-template: " << value << endl;
}

int main() {
    int x = 42;
    display(x);
    return 0;
}
